name: find_in_files
description: Search for text patterns in files with context-limited results. Designed for efficient repository searching with token optimization.

path.description: Directory or file path to search. Default: current directory

max_context_lines.description: Maximum context lines per match. Default: 25, Max: 50

max_matches.description: Maximum number of matches to return. Default: 20

include_binary.description: Include binary files in search. Default: false

show_cli.description: Display results in terminal. Default: true

examples.description: Search for function definitions in Python files
